ClipCard

Responsive Web, Interface Design

ClipCard was working on making it easier to find your cloud files. By combining things like Dropbox and Google Drive into one searchable UI, you could search all your cloud-based stuff at once, and would no longer have to remember which of the seemingly endless cloud storage services your file is on. I worked with ClipCard to help clarify their search UX, and to improve the interface design of the app.
